txt.en: 'The Smithy is fully operational and stocked with the best equipment, tools, and supplies that you will find in any town across all of Rohan. It is time to send out a call for experienced metal, armour, and weaponsmiths to come to Hytbold and work the forges.'
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Hereswith
